name: Time Magic-User Vampire
description:
Made in Inform 7. You are a vampire who have been overthrown by a rival and left for dead. You need to find a victim to feed off, then use your time-stopping powers to get revenge.

Unusual commands: DRAIN, STOP TIME, START TIME (note: the last two can only be used after you have drunk blood).

Still a bit rough around the edges, but it's a functional game. I may polish and expand it sometime in the future.

A walkthrough can be found here

The game can also be played online here
